Talented Web Developer Interface Engineer Make Your Mark

16 Nov 2005


\nTalented Web Developer / Technical Designer: Come join a well funded Web 2.0 startup that has a Google sized business opportunity!

Sharefare Corporation is creating the next great consumer-oriented Internet service. Think Hotmail, EBay, PayPal, Google, and you start to get the idea. Our service is based on a strong technical foundation. We have a solid business plan with a fast track to revenue and profitability. We have received Series B funding from influential and highly respected sources.

We are now hiring. This is the chance to get in on a Google-sized opportunity at the very beginning. Come join us and make your mark!

We are seeking a talented Web Developer / Technical Designer to help us refine and test our new web service.

Requirements:

Can develop pixel perfect XHTML templates based on the latest web standards.
\nHas a thorough knowledge of CSS, Javascript, and DOM plus knows what works with what browsers.
\nProduction level knowledge of commonly used web design programs: Photoshop, ImageReady, Fireworks, etc.
\nImage optimization skills.
\nHighly organized, eye for details, and works well in a team based environment.
\nCross platform browser scripting and unit testing expertise: Windows, Linux, Macintosh.
\n3+ years of web development or design experience.

Pluses

A working knowledge of AJAX style Javascript coding, its limitations, and where to use it.
\nExperience scripting XML/Dynamic driven Flash movies.
\nFamiliar with JSTL tag libraries and JSP.
\nExperience working for a large consumer oriented website or online community.
\nKnowledge of the Eclipse development environment and CVS.
\nExperience working with design and development teams.

We are very interested in seeing your working examples and experiments.

Our office is located in Los Altos, California.
\nSend resumes and site links to: webdevresumes@sharefare.com
